item.slimesurvival.polar_bear_fur.toolti: §7• Can be found in medium quantities on polar bears
§7• Essential material for winter clothing and medical dressings
item.slimesurvival.axolotl_gills.tooltip: §7• Rare drop from axolotls and "fish" fishing
§7• Potent regenerative abilities that can be used in armor and medicine
item.slimesurvival.mystite_tool_rod.deta: §7A reinforced stick used for the crafting of stronger tools and weapons.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ore.detail[0]: §7Contains slight traces of redstone and an unknown metal.
item.slimesurvival.mystite_ore.detail[1]: §7Extremely resilient to high temperatures; use a blast furnace.
item.slimesurvival.enderium_alloy.detail: §7May have some applications as an ingredient
item.slimesurvival.rift_battleaxe.detail: §7A heavy weapon that swings slow but hits §lreally§r§7 hard.
§7Right clicking will push away nearby mobs and players at the
§7cost of a short movement speed penalty afterwards with cooldown.
item.slimesurvival.ban_hammer.detail[0]: §7It unleashes an ungodly amount of energy at whomever it hits.
item.slimesurvival.winter_coat.detail_0: §7Made from polar bear fur and leather fox hide.
item.slimesurvival.winter_coat.detail_1: §7It provides a moderate amount of insulation.
